fluid.description: Determines whether the container should take 100% of its parent width. If set, size prop is ignored. false by default.
fluid.description_zh: 确定容器是否应占用其父宽度的 100%。如果设置，则忽略 size 属性。false 默认。

size.description: Sets max-width of the container, value is not responsive – it is the same for all screen sizes. Numbers are converted to rem. Ignored when fluid prop is set. 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 设置容器的最大宽度，值不是响应式 - 它对于所有屏幕大小都是相同的。数字转换为 rem。设置 fluid 属性时忽略。默认为 'md'
